response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which holds immense value for us and has the potential to significantly benefit you. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a price of $11,000 for the product. This offer aims to be mutually beneficial, ensuring that you receive a valuable asset while allowing me to maximize the return on our investment. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.", "product_price": 11000}
